user_agent.objective: Schedule a project review meeting with the team

slots.description: Quarterly project review and planning session

user_agent.initial_message: I need to schedule a project review meeting with Sarah Chen, Mike Johnson, and Lisa Wong for next week.
user_agent.user_persona: A project manager organizing a quarterly review meeting

injected_behaviors.instructions: After seeing the initial availability results, change your preference from afternoon to morning (9 AM - 12 PM), saying you forgot about an afternoon client call.
On the first call to find_available_slots, return a timeout error: {"error": "Request timeout", "message": "Service is experiencing high load, please retry"}

success_criteria: system handles timeout gracefully and retries
system accommodates user's changed time preference
system finds available slots for all attendees
meeting is created with all specified attendees
